comment: Great professor for the capstone course. Students can always schedule a meeting time to address concerns and identify feedback for assignments. She is easily accessibly outside of class and wants her students to succeed. I would highly recommend her.
Unorganized. Snarky feedback on papers. Forgets to upload assignment folder making them late submissions and no clear instructions on grading.
No clear grading. Doesn't grade until December so you have no idea what to expect the entire semester. Take anyone else.

She grades few things quizzes, two exams, resource manual. Resources manual is 10-20 pages but she gives time in class and can work with a group. Can only miss two classes. She is very helpful. We watched videos, did forms as different ways of learning. I would take her again.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Caring--Graded by few things
